text: Artur Eduardovich Nigmatullin (; born 17 May 1991) is a Russian football goalkeeper. He plays for FC Arsenal Tula. ==Club career== In 2010, he was suspended for 10 months after he failed a drug test.UEFA bans CSKA Moscow keeper for doping reuters.com 12 May 2010 He made his professional debut for FC Mordovia Saransk on 4 April 2011 in a Russian First Division game against FC SKA-Energiya Khabarovsk.
